name: Shopping List
description: Making sure you have enough Mana Orbs.

garage-button.name: Garage Button
garage-button.description: If you want the mod's button to show up in the Icon Kit.

show-paths.name: Display Paths
show-paths.description: Adds a sixth page that goes for the <cy>Paths of Power</c>.

disable-checkmark.name: Remove Checkmark
disable-checkmark.description: Icons aren't greyed out and displayed without checkmark. If you want to see the designs.
